summary: Intimidatingly endowed male Frost Trolls are invading Skyrim. [ADULT CONTENT!]
descriptionHtml:
ADULT CONTENT AHEAD!
If you don't like mods like this, skip it!


This mod adds an intimidating set of genitals to all Frost Trolls in Skyrim, making them male.
The other trolls are not affected by this mod.

_______________________________

* Requirements
* Installation
* Uninstallation
* Known Bugs, Issues, Incompatibilities
* Savegames

_______________________________



- REQUIREMENTS -

Skyrim!
No other requirements.


- INSTALLATION -


Extract the archive into your Skyrim\Data\ folder.

OR select the two folders included in the archive and drag them into your Skyrim\Data\ folder,
confirm the warning that the folders already exist.

OR manually move the files into the following directories (create them if they don't already exist):

troll_penis.dds |
troll_penis_n.dds | -> All three files go into Skyrim\Data\textures\actors\troll\
troll_penis_sk.dds |

troll.nif | -> Goes into Skyrim\Data\meshes\actors\troll\character assets\



- UNINSTALLATION -


Remove the files you extracted to / manually placed in the folders specified above.


- BUGS, ISSUES, INCOMPATIBILITIES -


No bugs are currently known.
The mod uses it's own texture files and does not collide with
texture-changes that have been made to the Frost Troll by other mods.
Mods that change the bodymesh of the Frost Troll MIGHT collide with this mod.


- SAVEGAMES -


No special precautions necessary. After removing the mod/files, any Frost Trolls
found in your savegames will revert back to their default look.

A full readme is included in the archive!



_____________________________________________________

[/list]
author: Derrax
